maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/548/se.orig: ...A Trial it is you seek, and a trial you shall receive...
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/548/se.text: ... Vous cherchez une épreuve, donc c'est une épreuve que vous aurez...

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/548/se.orig: ...Patience has become rare in this world..
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/548/se.text: ... La patience est devenue rare dans ce monde...

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/548/se.orig: ...This trial will test your focus and will...
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/548/se.text: ... Cette épreuve testera votre concentration et votre volonté...

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/548/se.orig: ...Watch the pipe, as water fills up and flows out...
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/548/se.text: ... Observez le tuyau de bambou, pendant qu'il se remplit d'eau et qu'il se vide...

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/548/se.orig: ...Speak to me again if you wish to begin the trial...
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/548/se.text: ... Revenez me parlez si vous souhaitez démarrer l'épreuve...

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/548/se.orig: Y-You think that bug will go away while we wait patiently?
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/548/se.text: T-Tu penses que le scarabée va s'en aller pendant que l'on attend patiemment ?

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/548/se.orig: Of course not. Why would it.
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/548/se.text: Bien sûr que non. Pourquoi il le ferait.

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/548/se.orig: ...Stand in the flower circle, still like a stone...
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/548/se.text: ... Tenez-vous dans le cercle de fleurs, immobile comme une pierre...
... Observez bien le tuyau en bambou attentivement...

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/548/se.orig:
...Wait patiently until it touches
the stone \c[3]12 times\c[0]...
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/548/se.text:
... Attendez patiemment jusqu'à qu'il touche
la pierre \c[3]12 fois\c[0]...
... Et ensuite vous pourrez frapper cet interrupteur...

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/548/se.orig: Wait for the pipe to touch the stone \c[3]12 times\c[0], then hit the switch.
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/548/se.text: Attendez que le tuyau touche la pierre \c[3]12 fois\c[0], puis touchez l'interrupteur.

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/578/se.orig: ...You lost your patience and moved out of the circle...
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/578/se.text: ... Vous avez perdu patience et êtes sortis du cercle...

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/578/se.orig: ...Talk to me again to test your patience once more...
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/578/se.text: ... Parlez-moi encore une fois pour tester votre patience une fois de plus...

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/579/se.text: ... Le tuyau a touché la pierre \c[3]\v[tmp.finalCount]\c[0] fois...
... Vous avez réagi au bon moment...
... Et donc, vous avez terminé l'\c[3]Épreuve de Patience\c[0]...

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/579/se.orig: ...Take this token as a sign of your victory...
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/579/se.text: ... Prenez ceci comme symbole de votre réussite...

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/579/se.orig: ...You lost patience and hit the switch too soon...
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/579/se.text: ... Vous avez perdu patience et touché l'interrupteur trop tôt...

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/579/se.orig: ...You lost focus and missed the right moment...
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/579/se.text: ... Vous avez perdu votre concentration et raté le bon moment...

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/579/se.orig: ...Talk to me again to test your patience once more...
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/579/se.text: ... Parlez-moi encore une fois pour tester votre patience une fois de plus...

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: This...\. This is boring.
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: C'est...\. C'est ennuyeux.

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: This is so relaxing.
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: C'est si relaxant.

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: Oh, it's the Trial of Patience, I see...
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: Oh, c'est l'Épreuve de Patience, je vois...

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: This... This can't be right!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: C'est... C'est pas possible !

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: This pipe is CHEATING!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: Le tuyau TRICHE !

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: That pipe... that doesn't seem physically correct, does it?
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: Ce tuyau... ça n'a pas l'air d'être physiquement correct, non ?

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: Gosh, Water in CrossWorlds. Not gonna get over that.
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: Eh ben. L'eau dans CrossWorlds. Ce n'est vraiment pas ça.

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: Hush, Nerd!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: Chut, Intello !

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: ...Wait...
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: ... Attends...

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: They really had fun with that bamboo fountain, didn't they?
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: Ils se sont vraiment bien amusé avec cette fontaine bambou, n'est-ce pas ?

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: By the way! I've found a way to add a counter to make your life easier, Lea!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: D'ailleurs ! J'ai trouvé un moyen d'ajouter un compteur pour te simplifier la vie, Lea !

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: Pipe Hit Count
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: Nombre de Coups du Tuyau

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: W...Wait... Damn, I made a mistake!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: A...Attends... Mince, j'ai fait une erreur !

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: Lea, please ignore the counter! It's wrong!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: Lea, s'il te plaît, ignore le compteur ! Il est faux !

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: Man, I remember how I saw a fountain like this in real life a long time ago.
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: Ça me rappelle la fois ou j'ai vu une fontaine comme ça dans la vraie vie il y a longtemps.

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: How many years was it?\. \c[3]6\c[0]?\. Maybe even \c[3]8\c[0].
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: C'était il y a combien d'années déjà ?\. \c[3]6\c[0] ?\. Peut-être même \c[3]8\c[0].

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: Anyway people kept throwing coins at it for good luck.
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: En tout cas des gens lui lançaient toujours des pièces pour porter chance.

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: And there was this one guy that threw like...\. \c[3]10 coins\c[0] at it at once.\. The poor thing almost broke!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: Et il y avait un type qui a lancé genre...\. \c[3]10 pièces\c[0] à la fois.\. Le pauvre machin s'est presque cassé !

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: I heard stories of seekers that managed to fail this challenge for over \c[3]8 times\c[0]!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: J'ai lu des histoires de pisteurs qui ont réussi à échouer cette épreuve au moins \c[3]8 fois\c[0] !

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: That is ridiculous! Counting to \c[3]12\c[0] should be easy! It's barely more than \c[3]10\c[0]!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: C'est absurde ! Compter jusqu'à \c[3]12\c[0] devrait être facile ! C'est juste un peu au-dessus de \c[3]10\c[0] !

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: Whyyyyyy?!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: Pourquoiiii ?!

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: What is it, Spheromancer Lea?\. Do you think counting to \c[3]10\c[0] is hard?\. What about \c[3]8\c[0]?
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: Qui y a-t-il, Spheromancer Lea ?\. Tu penses que compter jusqu'à \c[3]10\c[0] est difficile ?\. Et pour \c[3]8\c[0] ?
Hmm... \c[3]8\c[0] œufs,\. \c[3]6\c[0] carottes,\. \c[3]10\c[0] oignons...
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.note: still using the old spelling of 'ognon', which was changed in the 1990 ortographic overhaul that nobody uses

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: Whyyyyyy?!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: Pourquoiiii ?!

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: Ah sorry, I'm trying to remember what I still have to buy for dinner tonight.
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: Ah désolé, j'essaye de me rappeler ce qu'il faut encore que j'achète pour le diner ce soir.

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: Gotta have to start cooking at \c[3]7\c[0] to be done in time.
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: Va falloir que je commence à cuisiner à \c[3]7\c[0] heures si je veux avoir fini à temps.

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: Wait!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: Attends !

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: Err... Did it tip \c[3]6\c[0] times now?\. Or was it \c[3]7\c[0], already?\. Dang it.
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: Euh... Est-ce qu'il a penché \c[3]6\c[0] fois là ?\. Ou est-ce que ça fait déjà \c[3]7\c[0] fois ?\. Mince.

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: I was distracted by the implausible water physics and forgot to count...
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: J'ai été obnubilé par la physique illogique de l'eau et j'ai oublié de compter...

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: So like...\. where are we now?\. \c[3]9\c[0]? \c[3]11\c[0]?\. Gosh, I messed up!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: Donc euh...\. on en est où là ?\. À \c[3]9\c[0] ? ou à \c[3]11\c[0] ?\. Mince, j'ai vraiment tout raté !

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: Whyyyy?!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: Pourquoiii ?!

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/591/se.orig: ...The water must flow naturally, no tampering allowed...
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/591/se.text: ... L'eau doit s'écouler naturellement, aucune perturbation autorisée...

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/591/se.orig: ...Talk to me again to test your patience once more...
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/591/se.text: ... Parlez-moi encore une fois pour tester votre patience une fois de plus...

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/593/se.orig: Somebody heeelp!\. There are way too many of them!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/593/se.text: À l'aide !\. Il y en a beaucoup trooop !

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/606/se.orig: PLEASE WHY SO MANY BUGS AGAIN CAN I PLEASE HAVE A BREAK?!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/606/se.text: POURQUOI ENCORE AUTANT DE SCARABÉES ?! JE POURRAIS AVOIR UNE PAUSE ?!

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/606/se.orig: This amount of opponents it's.... it's very unjust!!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/606/se.text: Cette quantité d'adversaires est... elle est très injuste !!

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/606/se.orig: How is it even possible to assemble so many enemies?
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/606/se.text: Comment c'est possible de rassembler autant d'ennemis ?

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/606/se.orig: There really is no end to them, is there?
Just how many of those bug are there?
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/606/se.text: Mais il y en a combien de ces scarabées, là ?

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/606/se.orig: Ahhhhh!\. Why won't they stop coming?!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/606/se.text: Ahhhhh !\. Pourquoi il en vient toujours plus ?!

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Now HERE's how you make an entrance!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Bon, VOILÀ comment on fait une entrée en scène !

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: The cavalry's here!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: La cavalerie arrive !

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Phew...\. I don't think I've ever seen so many beetles attacking at once!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Pfiou...\. Je ne pense pas avoir vu autant de scarabées qui attaquent en même temps !

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Haha, you could say that again!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Haha, ça tu peux le dire !

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Wait... it's you?
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Attends... C'est toi ?

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Yup!\. Thanks again for the rescue!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Ouaip !\. Merci encore pour m'avoir sauvé !

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: ...\. No problem...\. That was...\. how often now?
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: ...\. Pas de problème...\. Ça ne fait que... combien de fois ?

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Dunno, I lost count!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Je sais pas, j'ai arrêté de compter !

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Seriously, you really should be more careful about the kinds of battles you end up in.
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Sérieusement, tu devrais faire attention dans quel genre de combats tu te retrouves.

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Make sure to prepare yourself,\. learn skills,\. upgrade your equipment...
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Prépare-toi pour ça,\. apprend des compétences,\. améliore ton équipement...

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: I know!\. In fact, I just collected the last few items I needed for the gear I always wanted!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Je sais !\. En fait, je viens juste d'obtenir les derniers items dont j'avais besoin pour l'équipement dont j'ai toujours voulu !

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Finally I can get rid of the Ba'kii Kum stuff...
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Enfin je peux me débarrasser des trucs de \v[area.heat-village.name]...

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: You...\. didn't upgrade your equipment for so long?!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Tu...\. n'as pas amélioré ton équipement depuis si longtemps ?!

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Haha, yeah...\. pretty much.
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Haha, oui...\. un peu.

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Why?!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Pourquoi ?!

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: I didn't want to waste money and items on equipment that I'd replace later on anyway, see?
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Je voulais pas gaspiller de l'argent et des items pour des équipements que je finirais par remplacer plus tard, tu comprends ?

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: That...\. I mean...
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: C'est...\. Je veux dire...

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Just HOW did you even manage to get this far?!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Mais COMMENT tu as pu réussir à aller aussi loin ?!

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Well...\. you helping me out when I was in trouble certainly helped a lot!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Eh bien...\. Le fait que vous m'aidiez à chaque fois que j'avais des ennuis m'a certainement bien aidé !

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: But like, the Gaia's Garden temples are solo instances, how did you...
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Mais... Les temples du \v[area.jungle.name] sont des instances solo, comment tu as pu...

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Faceroll it till you make it, right?
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: J'ai juste essayé jusqu'à que je réussisse ?

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Anyway, gotta get my new gear now!\. See you around!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Bon, il faut que j'aille prendre mon nouvel équipement maintenant !\. À plus !
... Argh...

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: We're done!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Bon, on a terminé !

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Hi!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Salut !

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Nice work!!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Bon travail !!

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: That was a lot of samurai bugs, huh?
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Ça en faisait beaucoup des scarabées samurai, hein ?

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Yes, indeed.
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Oui, effectivement.

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: And our little Triblader-troublemaker looked happy...
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Et notre Triblader bon-à-rien avait l'air content...

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Yeah...\. that guy sure keeps us busy...
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Oui...\. Ce type nous donne toujours du boulot...

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: He does, doesn't he?
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Ça on peut le dire, hein ?

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: That's why I setup a notification for whenever he logs in!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: C'est pour ça que je me suis configuré une notification à chaque fois qu'il se connecte.

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: He's been surprisingly quiet today, so I lost track of his movements until, like three fights ago.
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Il a été assez discret aujourd'hui, donc j'ai perdu la trace de ses mouvements depuis, peut-être trois combats.

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: But usually he gets into trouble minutes after he logs in!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Mais d'habitude il s'attire des ennuis quelques minutes après qu'il se connecte !

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: He's helped me perfect my timing because he's so predictable!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Il m'a aidé à perfectionner mon timing parce qu'il est si prédictible !

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: How many times have we saved him already?
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Combien de fois on l'a déjà sauvé de la mouise ?

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Let me check!\. Hm...\. about 340 times now?\. Wow!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Attends, je regarde !\. Mmmm...\. déjà 340 fois maintenant ?\. Waouh !

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Yeah, it's about time we stopped saving that one.
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Je pense qu'il est temps qu'on arrête de le sauver, lui.

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Aww, you think so?
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Oh, tu penses vraiment ?

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: He's become way too careless, doesn't prepare for his battles at all.
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Il est devenu bien trop imprudent, il se prépare même plus pour ses combats.

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: He's relying on our help...\. way too much.
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Il compte sur notre aide...\. bien trop souvent.

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: We're here to rescue people in need...\. but people still should learn to fight for themselves.
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: On est là pour sauver les gens en péril...\. mais il faut bien qu'ils apprennent à se battre par eux-mêmes.

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Well, when you're right you're right...\. our first exception.\. Maybe I should design him a badge!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Bon, quand tu as raison tu as raison...\. notre première exception.\. Peut-être que je devrais lui faire une médaille !

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Ooh!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Ooh !

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Someone else needs help!\. And it's not that guy.
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Quelqu'un à besoin d'aide !\. Et ce n'est pas ce type.

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: I'll take this one!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Je m'en occupe !

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: It was great meeting you, Lea!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: C'était sympa de t'avoir rencontré, Lea !

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Bye!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Bye !

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Well that sure was something.
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Bon, c'était vraiment pas banal.

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: [acquiesce]

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: I think you've helped us more than enough.\. Thanks a lot!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Je pense que tu nous as aidé plus que nécessaire.\. Merci beaucoup !

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: And of course, as promised, here's your reward.
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Et bien sûr, comme promis, voici ta récompense.

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Alright...\. I gotta go.
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Sinon...\. Il faut que j'y aille.

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: You never know when someone might need our help...\. at exactly the right time.
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: On sait jamais quand quelqu'un aura besoin de notre aide...\. à la dernière minute.

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Feel free to drop by at the headquarters whenever you like!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Tu peux revenir dans notre quartier général quand tu veux !
